Title: Non-Persistent XSS
Description: Shopware is affected by two non-persistent Cross-site Scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in the frontend.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 5.2.0-alpha0 up to 5.3.6
NotImpacted: All versions before 5.2.0-alpha0, all versions after 5.3.6
Solution: Upgrade to version v5.3.7 or above.
